description: This file contains the implementation of container functions for the Slap Var Helper Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the helper object, as well as setting up various member function pointers related to variable handling and conversion.

classes.name: SLAP_VAR_HELPER_OBJECT
classes.description: The main container object representing the Slap Var Helper.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapVhoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Slap Var Helper Object, setting up core member variables and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapVhoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified Slap Var Helper Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapVhoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls any subordinate objects required by the helper object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapVhoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the helper object, setting up its member functions and variables.
